programme.title: Ritual
programme.desc: Peter, dan isterinya jenny, serta anak perempuan mereka lisa, dan kekasihnya michael berkelah di satu tempat yang terpencil. Pelbagai perkara seram terjadi sepanjang mereka disana.

programme.title: Daddyku Gangster
programme.desc: Ray ialah ketua geng mencuri kereta mewah, dan terlibat dalam kelab petarungan bawah tanah. Dia tidak mempunyai hubungan yang baik dengan keluarganya, tetapi apabila abangnya Remy dan isteri Remy meninggal dunia dalam satu kemalangan yang tragis, Ray terkejut kerana abangnya telah menyatakan niatnya dalam wasiat dan telah memilih Ray untuk menjadi penjaganya. dua orang anak - Arisha dan Aidil.

programme.title: Rambo Last Blood
programme.desc: Kehidupan damai John Rambo terganggu apabila Gabriela, cucu kawannya, hilang di Mexico. Dia memutuskan untuk membebaskannya daripada cengkaman kartel tempatan, memulakan kitaran membalas dendam.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Kumpulan O
programme.desc: Sekumpulan saintis berjaya mencipta sebuah formula bagi menggantikan minyak petrol untuk menggerakkan kereta. Walau bagaimanapun, kegembiraan mereka tidak kekal lama apabila formula tersebut telah dicuri oleh sekumpulan penjahat. Mereka cuba memburu serta mendapatkan semula formula itu daripada jatuh ke tangan orang yang tidak bertanggungjawab.

programme.title: Burung Besi
programme.desc: Azri, seorang remaja yang pintar suka bermain kapal terbang kawalan jarak jauh milik ayahnya. Dia memasang kamera pegun yang membolehkannya mengambil gambar setiap 10 saat. Gambar yang diambil olehnya telah membawanya kepada kegiatan penyeludupan milik My Lady. My Lady cuba untuk menghapuskan Azri dan rakannya supaya dia boleh kekal beroperasi.

programme.title: Pasung Puaka
programme.desc: Di sebuah kampung bernama Batu Rakit terdapat sebuah pasung yang digunakan untuk menghukum orang yang bersalah. Penghulu di kampung itu bernama Tok Kajai. Gadek, orang kanan Tok Kajai sering membuat onar dan cuba menggulingkannya. Pada suatu hari, seorang pemuda bernama Wira datang ke kampung itu dan sering menolong orang-orang yang teraniaya. Wira kemudiannya dilantik sebagai penolong Tok Kajai dan perkara ini telah membuatkan Gadek merasa tercabar. Gadek dan konco-konconya cuba merancang sesuatu agar Wira dapat dihukum dengan cara dipasung.

programme.title: Evolusi KL Drift
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Zack dan Sham berkongsi minat yang sama iaitu perlumbaan kereta drift. Dalam masa yang sama, Zack menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan Fasha, seorang wanita yang turut mempunyai minat yang mendalam terhadap perlumbaan kereta drift. Walau bagaimanapun, hubungan mereka menjadi semakin dingin kerana Zack sering mengongkong hidup Fasha. Sham cuba untuk mendamaikan mereka berdua tetapi timbul pula bibit-bibit cinta antara dia dengan Fasha.

programme.title: Raja Laut
programme.desc: Para pelaut sering terancam dengan kegiatan seorang lanun bernama Raja Laut yang sering melakukan keganasan. Oleh kerana Raja Laut sangat licik dalam kegiatan haramnya, pihak berkuasa mengalami kesukaran untuk memberkasnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Raja Laut telah menjalinkan hubungan dengan adik seorang pegawai tentera laut yang menyukarkan lagi pihak berkuasa untuk menangkapnya.

programme.title: Pecah
programme.desc: Empat orang lelaki berjaya merompak sebuah bank tetapi malangnya salah seorang daripada mereka cedera dan terpaksa dirawat di hospital. Pada masa yang sama, seorang wanita yang menjaga orang tua di sebuah rumah orang tua, membawa salah seorang penghuninya ke hospital yang sama untuk mendapatkan rawatan. Apa yang berlaku kemudiannya ialah pembongkaran demi pembongkaran agenda tersembunyi, di samping penyiasatan daripada pihak polis pada masa yang sama.

programme.title: Jaket Biru
programme.desc: Untuk menumpaskan sebuah kumpulan penyeludupan anak gadis ke luar negara, pihak polis telah menubuhkan sebuah pasukan rahsia yang bernama Jaket Biru. Pasukan yang diketuai oleh Azizan itu ditugaskan untuk melakukan intipan dengan menyertai aktiviti haram tersebut.

programme.title: Evolusi KL Drift
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Zack dan Sham berkongsi minat yang sama iaitu perlumbaan kereta drift. Dalam masa yang sama, Zack menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan Fasha, seorang wanita yang turut mempunyai minat yang mendalam terhadap perlumbaan kereta drift. Walau bagaimanapun, hubungan mereka menjadi semakin dingin kerana Zack sering mengongkong hidup Fasha. Sham cuba untuk mendamaikan mereka berdua tetapi timbul pula bibit-bibit cinta antara dia dengan Fasha.

programme.title: Kumpulan O
programme.desc: Sekumpulan saintis berjaya mencipta sebuah formula bagi menggantikan minyak petrol untuk menggerakkan kereta. Walau bagaimanapun, kegembiraan mereka tidak kekal lama apabila formula tersebut telah dicuri oleh sekumpulan penjahat. Mereka cuba memburu serta mendapatkan semula formula itu daripada jatuh ke tangan orang yang tidak bertanggungjawab.

programme.title: Pelumba Malam
programme.desc: Ketika masih kecil, Jeff menyaksikan kes pembunuhan bapanya yang dilakukan oleh Rizal. Untuk menjejaki pembunuh bapanya, Jeff menyertai kumpulan pelumba haram yang didalangi Rizal untuk mendapatkan bukti. Ketika menyertai Kumpulan itu, Jeff bertemu Tini, kekasih Zul yang menjadi orang kanan Rizal. Dalam masa yang sama, Jeff berkenalan dengan Ema namun merahsiakan misinya untuk memburu Rizal. Jeff ingin membongkarkan kesemua kegiatan jenayah Rizal serta mengheretnya ke muka pengadilan.

programme.title: Raja Laut
programme.desc: Para pelaut sering terancam dengan kegiatan seorang lanun bernama Raja Laut yang sering melakukan keganasan. Oleh kerana Raja Laut sangat licik dalam kegiatan haramnya, pihak berkuasa mengalami kesukaran untuk memberkasnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Raja Laut telah menjalinkan hubungan dengan adik seorang pegawai tentera laut yang menyukarkan lagi pihak berkuasa untuk menangkapnya.

programme.title: Pecah
programme.desc: Empat orang lelaki berjaya merompak sebuah bank tetapi malangnya salah seorang daripada mereka cedera dan terpaksa dirawat di hospital. Pada masa yang sama, seorang wanita yang menjaga orang tua di sebuah rumah orang tua, membawa salah seorang penghuninya ke hospital yang sama untuk mendapatkan rawatan. Apa yang berlaku kemudiannya ialah pembongkaran demi pembongkaran agenda tersembunyi, di samping penyiasatan daripada pihak polis pada masa yang sama.

programme.title: Lurah Dendam
programme.desc: Sekumpulan ahli payung terjun yang diketuai Kapten Hanafi dalam penerbangan untuk membuat penerjunan di Kuantan. Kapal terbang yang mereka naiki terlanggar seekor burung helang dan mengakibatkan pesawat itu bergegar. Dalam keadaan kelam kabut itu, seorang demi seorang penerjun melompat keluar dan mendarat di sebuah kawasan hutan. Di sana, mereka diganggu pelbagai peristiwa dan menganggap tempat itu berpuaka. Namun, Kapten Hanafi mengesyaki semua peristiwa itu adalah berpunca daripada perbuatan manusia.

programme.title: Ribut Di Hujung Senja
programme.desc: Andak dan seorang kawannya yang baru tiba di Pulau Segara untuk mencari akar kayu. Mereka telah diserang oleh sekumpulan samseng yang diketuai oleh Jalong sehingga mengakibatkan kematian kawannya. Penghulu telah memerintahkan supaya Andak dikurung sebelum hukuman dijatuhkan. Pada suatu malam, Antoi, anak gadis Penghulu memberi sedikit makanan kepada Andak kerana bersimpati dengan nasibnya. Apabila mendapat tahu perkara ini, Jalong berasa sakit hati kerana dia menaruh hati kepada Antoi namun tidak diendahkan. Atas nasihat anak lelakinya, Uda, Penghulu membuat satu pertandingan di antara Andak dengan Jalong untuk menentukan siapakah yang benar.

programme.title: Jaket Biru
programme.desc: Untuk menumpaskan sebuah kumpulan penyeludupan anak gadis ke luar negara, pihak polis telah menubuhkan sebuah pasukan rahsia yang bernama Jaket Biru. Pasukan yang diketuai oleh Azizan itu ditugaskan untuk melakukan intipan dengan menyertai aktiviti haram tersebut.

programme.title: Burung Besi
programme.desc: Azri, seorang remaja yang pintar suka bermain kapal terbang kawalan jarak jauh milik ayahnya. Dia memasang kamera pegun yang membolehkannya mengambil gambar setiap 10 saat. Gambar yang diambil olehnya telah membawanya kepada kegiatan penyeludupan milik My Lady. My Lady cuba untuk menghapuskan Azri dan rakannya supaya dia boleh kekal beroperasi.

programme.title: Pasung Puaka
programme.desc: Di sebuah kampung bernama Batu Rakit terdapat sebuah pasung yang digunakan untuk menghukum orang yang bersalah. Penghulu di kampung itu bernama Tok Kajai. Gadek, orang kanan Tok Kajai sering membuat onar dan cuba menggulingkannya. Pada suatu hari, seorang pemuda bernama Wira datang ke kampung itu dan sering menolong orang-orang yang teraniaya. Wira kemudiannya dilantik sebagai penolong Tok Kajai dan perkara ini telah membuatkan Gadek merasa tercabar. Gadek dan konco-konconya cuba merancang sesuatu agar Wira dapat dihukum dengan cara dipasung.

programme.title: Sumpah Semerah Padi
programme.desc: Sebuah daerah bernama Semerah Padi berada dalam keadaan aman damai di bawah pemerintahan Demang Satria. Namun, keadaan menjadi kucar kacir apabila Semerah Padi diserang oleh sekumpulan pengganas. Demang Satria mati dibunuh manakala isteri dan anak-anaknya dihalau keluar daripada Semerah Padi. Adi Putera, anak lelaki Demang Satria ialah seorang pemuda yang taat pada agama namun tidak memiliki keberanian untuk mempertahankan diri. Dia menuntut ilmu persilatan dengan Andika. Adi Putera bertekad untuk membalas dendam serta kembali memerintah Semerah Padi dengan ajaran Islam.

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas ditugaskan untuk menghapuskan sindiket pengedaran VCD haram dan pil khayal yang didalangi dua kumpulan. Dalam masa yang sama Inspektor Shafikah telah ditugaskan untuk membantu siasatan tersebut. Kehadiran Inspektor Shafikah disenangi oleh semua anggota unit terutamanya Inspektor Mazlan. Hal ini menimbulkan rasa cemburu Inspektor Aleza namun atas misi menghancurkan dua kumpulan penjenayah itu, dia mengenepikan soal peribadi.

programme.title: Ribut Di Hujung Senja

programme.title: Pelumba Malam
programme.desc: Ketika masih kecil, Jeff menyaksikan kes pembunuhan bapanya yang dilakukan oleh Rizal. Untuk menjejaki pembunuh bapanya, Jeff menyertai kumpulan pelumba haram yang didalangi Rizal untuk mendapatkan bukti. Ketika menyertai Kumpulan itu, Jeff bertemu Tini, kekasih Zul yang menjadi orang kanan Rizal. Dalam masa yang sama, Jeff berkenalan dengan Ema namun merahsiakan misinya untuk memburu Rizal. Jeff ingin membongkarkan kesemua kegiatan jenayah Rizal serta mengheretnya ke muka pengadilan.

programme.title: Kumpulan O
programme.desc: Sekumpulan saintis berjaya mencipta sebuah formula bagi menggantikan minyak petrol untuk menggerakkan kereta. Walau bagaimanapun, kegembiraan mereka tidak kekal lama apabila formula tersebut telah dicuri oleh sekumpulan penjahat. Mereka cuba memburu serta mendapatkan semula formula itu daripada jatuh ke tangan orang yang tidak bertanggungjawab.

programme.title: Evolusi KL Drift
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Zack dan Sham berkongsi minat yang sama iaitu perlumbaan kereta drift. Dalam masa yang sama, Zack menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan Fasha, seorang wanita yang turut mempunyai minat yang mendalam terhadap perlumbaan kereta drift. Walau bagaimanapun, hubungan mereka menjadi semakin dingin kerana Zack sering mengongkong hidup Fasha. Sham cuba untuk mendamaikan mereka berdua tetapi timbul pula bibit-bibit cinta antara dia dengan Fasha.

programme.desc: With 6 ethnic groups of Sarawak represented, the host brings out the particularities of each and every one of them, sharing the cross-pollinating nature of our diverse culinary cultures.

programme.title: Cigu! Nadai Bisi Utai Ep8
programme.desc: Halim, seorang guru muda lepasan maktab berusia 25 tahun dari Selangor, dilema menerima tawaran mengajar di sekolah rendah di pedalaman Sarawak. Ibu dan tunang menentang, tetapi bapanya menyokong.

programme.title: Khemah Kita Bah Ep2
programme.desc: Program ini dianggap sebagai "camping for dummies", dimana hos dan rakannya akan memberi dan menunjukkan tip-tip asas berkhemah, larangan dan langkah-langkah yang perlu diambil serta pendekatan memasak "outdoor" yang ringkas.

programme.title: Sarawak Panorama S2 Ep4
programme.desc: A country without a documentary is like a family without an album. Sarawak Panorama is the family album that my team and I whole heartedly and passionately dedicate to our beloved Sarawak.

programme.title: Menghilir Rajang S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Kehidupan penduduk yang tinggal di sepanjang sungai Rajang, Sarawak. Kedudukan geografinya yang strategik menjadikan sungai ini sebagai sumber ekonomi, pendidikan, perhubungan dan produk pelancongan

programme.title: My Health, My Choice Ep13
programme.desc: My Health, My Choice explores daily practices, behaviors, and health issues, highlighting factors like attitudes, diet, environment, and relationships, and provides practical solutions.

programme.title: Kedey Kita S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Orden Syam will use a food truck to visit local entrepreneurs outside Kuching city, such as Sibu, Sarikei, Sri Aman, Kapit, and Betong, helping them promote their businesses and offer exclusive promotions.

programme.title: Pejalai Kamek Orang Ep13
programme.desc: Hosted and narrated by Tony Eusoff, traces locations & stories from people who have heard, experienced and witnessed events right from Brooke Era in 1841 leading up to Sarawaks independence in July 1975

programme.title: Make It Happen! Ep13
programme.desc: 4 hosts host a reality TV game show, unaware of potential friendships. Each episode features unique themes and missions, and they must navigate challenges and drama with guests to form unexpected bonds.

programme.title: CCTV Ep4
programme.desc: After Datuk Ibrahim passes away, his estranged children Poch, Zak, Bob and Hana are called back to inherit the family fortune. For the next 12 months, they must move back and live in the family home..

programme.title: CCTV Ep5
programme.desc: After Datuk Ibrahim passes away, his estranged children Poch, Zak, Bob and Hana are called back to inherit the family fortune. For the next 12 months, they must move back and live in the family home..

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@7
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Misteri Kedai Gunting Ep1
programme.desc: Kisah misteri yang dihantar oleh individu yang pernah mengalami peristiwa seram dan diceritakan semula oleh pencerita di dalam sebuah kedai gunting.

programme.title: Design Nation Ep10
programme.desc: Design Nation is a serial TV magazine that documents the architecture of buildings by well-renowned architects that have won various awards locally and internationally.

programme.title: Nature XCO & Downhill Ep8
programme.desc: Program pertandingan sukan basikal lasak yang dianjurkan oleh Broad Vision Solution Sdn.Bhd dengan kerjasama Persatuan Basikal Sarawak dan Sarawak Sports Cooperation bersama Kerajaan Negeri Sarawak.

programme.title: Hope Finds Love Ep10
programme.desc: Hope, sorang penulis muda yang hiper , sering gagal dalam cinta. Namun, jodohnya sentiasa dekat dimata.

programme.title: Suara Alam Borneo Ep6
programme.desc: Suara Alam Borneo akan mengupasnya hutan hujan tropika berusia jutaan tahun secara terperinci dengan pelbagai spesis flora dan juga fauna menerusi informasi yang mudah difahami.

programme.title: Hustle Hasil S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Exploring various Small Medium Enterprises to discover their startup stories, their achievements, and how The Ministry of Trade has played a vital role in elevating SMEs.

programme.title: OKSHE Ep8
programme.desc: This slot showing about old Kuching Sarawak Heritage

programme.title: Main Uti Kelia Ep3
programme.desc: Dokumentari dalam Bahasa Iban yang membawa nostalgia mengenai permainan dan aktiviti golongan remaja & dewasa kaum Iban pada zaman dahulu dan sebelum wujudnya permainan & teknologi moden seperti sekarang

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Above & Beyond Ep6
programme.desc: This documentary highlight the individuals within the NGOs who go above and beyond their own ways to show love and kindness towards the community.

programme.title: PUSAKA Ep2
programme.desc: Meneroka budaya & warisan tempatan, juga mengimbau kembali kenangan zaman penjajahan dahulu serta kesannya terhadap jati diri bangsa.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Food Truck Road Trip Ep4
programme.desc: Watch the adventures of two friends, Azree & Kojak, on a journey in their Food Trucks as they drive from Miri to Kuching, making stops along the way. The duo cook dishes using locally sourced ingredients, and have misadventures as they discover new places while selling great food.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Khazanah Kenyalang Ep12
programme.desc: Sebuah siri dokumentari 13 episod tentang koleksi dan artifak berharga dan sangat penting; yang kini menjadi KHAZANAH NEGERI SARAWAK dan berada dalam simpanan MUZIUM NEGERI SARAWAK.

programme.title: Aurika "Gadis Penjual Mimpi" Ep7
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis yang gemar berangan dan mengimpikan jadi kaya bernama Aurika binti Abdullah yang dibesarkan oleh ibu angkatnya, Umi Ramlah seorang peniaga herba.

programme.title: Siney Tempat Best Ep10
programme.desc: An intriguing show promoting and unveiling brand new interesting places and hidden gems around Sarawak.

programme.title: Halik Ep44
programme.desc: Childhood lovers Jacky and Lino meet after being apart for several years. However, now married to different people, the two must choose whether to fight to be together again or be true to the promise made to their spouses.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Amran seorang budak Delivery yang gemar berlumba secara haram motor Drag. Satu hari selepas memenagi satu perlumbaan, Amran telah di hadiahkan seorang perempuan bernama Maya sebagai habuan perlumbaan. Malang tidak berbau, mereka telah kemalangan dan Maya mati ditempat kejadian.

programme.title: Demi Hati Arjuna
programme.desc: Alia disahkan menghidap penyakit hati Cirrhosis. Alia teringat masa silamnya memang liar. Bagi merawat penyakitnya, dia disaran melakukan transplan. Namun. Alia yang sebatang kara sukar untuk dia mendapatkan penderma. Dia kemudian teringat akan Arjuna, anak yang dia lahirkan 12 tahun dahulu bersama Zafran. Zafran tidak mahu bertanggungjawab. Anak itu diserahkan kepada orang lain selepas dinamakan sebagai Arjuna. Timbul rasa kesal dan sayang terhadap anaknya, akhirnya Alia minta maaf pada Arjuna dan dia tidak akan dapat mengambil hati Arjuna untuk kepentingan dia.

programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: It Takes A Man And Women
programme.desc: Miggy dan Laida pernah berpacaran tetapi berpisah kerana keadaan tertentu. Perkara-perkara berubah yang tidak dijangka apabila mereka mesti bekerjasama sambil juga menghadapi perasaan sebenar mereka antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Crime Kings
programme.desc: Seorang budak kaya-pergi-penyangak bertindak sebagai Robin Hood dalam kehidupan sebenar. Melindungi orang kaya, melindungi orang miskin, bermain permainan kucing-dan-tikus dengan polis tempatan, dalam karya zaman penuh aksi ini yang diilhamkan oleh kisah benar dari Thailand 1940-an.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Masuk Ke Hatiku Pelan-Pelan Aja Neng Bajaj
programme.desc: Sherin yang marah kepada kakak dan ayahnya, akhirnya memilih untuk meninggalkan rumah. Di sana, Sherin kemudian bekerja sebagai montir di sebuah bengkel bajaj. Ternyata, Sherin sudah jatuh hati kepada seorang pemandu bajaj yang tampan, di mana pemandu bajaj itu memiliki seorang adik yang masih bersekolah rendah, dan yang pernah dilanggar oleh Sherin.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep52
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Cintanya Salah Sambung Ke Hati Abang
programme.desc: Cindy kecewa dengan kekasihnya, Nando. Dia meminta perpisahan melalui teks dan segera menyekat nombornya untuk mengelakkan sebarang komunikasi. Cindy menyedari hubungan mereka tidak sihat sejak kebelakangan ini. Mereka bertengkar mengenai perkara kecil, seperti lewat dua minit, yang boleh menyebabkan pergaduhan besar. Bagaimanapun, dia merasakan bahawa ia tidak sepatutnya berakhir seperti ini.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep5
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep72
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Mas Ganteng Pawang Hatiku
programme.desc: Borhan, seorang pawang ramalan cuaca, mempunyai kehidupan cinta yang rumit dengan seorang pakar psikiatri yang cantik, Sarah. Dengan kuasanya sebagai pawang ramalan cuaca, cinta mereka dapat bersatu.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep150
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep6
programme.desc: Siri ini diarahkan oleh Gita Asmara dan dibintangi oleh Aliando Syarief, Sitha Marino, dan Erdin Werdrayana. Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga yang menghalang hubungan mereka. Darwin telah ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya sejak kecil.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep6
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Paket Liburan Miss Gengsi
programme.desc: Alyssa mendapat gaji yang minimum. Dia sering berjumpa dengan Farhan, seorang penjaga hotel yang tidak bertanggungjawab. Farhan bagaimanapun tidak ragu-ragu dengan cintanya terhadap Alyssa.

programme.title: Mas Ganteng Pawang Hatiku
programme.desc: Borhan, seorang pawang ramalan cuaca, mempunyai kehidupan cinta yang rumit dengan seorang pakar psikiatri yang cantik, Sarah. Dengan kuasanya sebagai pawang ramalan cuaca, cinta mereka dapat bersatu.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep53
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep150
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep6

programme.title: Trio Baperan Kena Polusi Cinta
programme.desc: Tiga pemuda bernama Malik, Jajang, dan Jarwo diterima bekerja di syarikat milik seorang gadis cantik bernama Dina. Ketiga-tiga mereka kelihatan tertarik dengan pesona bos mereka. Namun, diam-diam, Malik yang terkenal sebagai lelaki yg suka berfoya-foya menyakiti adik Dina, iaitu Monic. Sebagai kakak, Dina tidak berdiam diri. Dia diam-diam membalas dendam dengan membuat ketiga-tiga mereka tergila-gila padanya lalu mengabaikan perasaan cinta mereka.

programme.title: Perigut Ep3

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: The President's Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: Sympathy For Lady Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman planned revenge against her teacher after being wrongfully imprisoned for 13 years.

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: Love Reset
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Il Mare
programme.desc: A young woman from 1999 and a young man from 1997 begin a parallel-time love story separated by a span of two years when they start to receive each other's letters in the mailbox.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the islands dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: The President's Barber

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep498
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep3334
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep52
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep285286
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep722
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3424
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4873
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep52
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1915
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2193
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep998
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: High Risk
programme.desc: After failing to save his wife, Kit resigned as a cop and becomes the bodyguard and stunt double for a cowardly action film star, Frankie. When attending a jewel exhibition, they run into a band of robbers. Kit identifies the murderer of his wife amongst them and chases after him. Will Frankie regain his courage to help Kit?

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Iron Monkey 2
programme.desc: Iron Monkey teams up with a band of revolutionaries to fight a malevolent gang of weapon smugglers and takes revenge for his friends death.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Hero Among Heroes
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung assists Lin Ze Xu to crack down the opium trading in Guangzhou. Barac provokes Beggar So to kill Wong and Lin as they hinder his opium business. When So finally resolves his misunderstanding with Wong, he decides to join Wong to defeat Barac and stop the opium import.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: I Fine… Thank You… Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in the early 1970s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idols memory.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Return Of The One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperors tomb.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Lion Vs Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun, the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: One of the great Kung-fu film characters is Beggar Su, a legendary Ching Dynasty figure who was also a member of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers. Little-known director Liu Shih-yu uses the best Kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer to tell a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure, as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liangs work, but essentially an image to him as well.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep73
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - Martin travels to Papua New Guinea and lives amongst the subsistence farmers of the Trobriand Islands. There, he plays their favourite game - cricket! programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep19
programme.desc: Food Factory celebrates night shift workers. At California's state fair in Sacramento, Chef Keith Breedlove cooking demos draw in hungry diners. In collaboration with Old Soul Bakers, Keith and his team need prep 200 BLTs.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep20
programme.desc: A Toronto bakery prepares a mammoth order for one of the world's most prestigious hotels. Meanwhile, the overnight juicing team scrambles as a costly mistake puts them behind schedule.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Journey across Madagascar, the oldest island on Earth. Over time, it has given rise to more unique plants and animals - from its famed lemurs to colourful chameleons - than any other island.

programme.title: The Lakes with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the glorious Lake District National Park and the county of Cumbria, with its magnificent mountains, glacial valleys and 16 iconic lakes and meres.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Vacuum Cleaner - Hannah takes a look at the vacuum cleaner, going behind the scenes with Dyson and discovering how the motor in their latest vacuum spins nine times faster than that of a Formula One race car.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Cook Islands/ Kūki 'Airani Ep6
programme.desc: Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South America Ep7
programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Mission Black Rhino Ep1
programme.desc: Its a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission thats part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Foxes Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Southeast Asia Ep8
programme.desc: With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Rivers Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombias high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Carnivore Rescue Ep2
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Seasonal Ep2
programme.desc: Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Water Worlds Ep3
programme.desc: Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Seasonal Ep2
programme.desc: Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Water Worlds Ep3
programme.desc: Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - USA Ep9
programme.desc: The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Skies Ep3
programme.desc: Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Bretons Bras dOr Lake, to the birds overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagles raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Warriors of the Llanos Ep3
programme.desc: The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale Ep1

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In Eastbourne, Emma and Nick come to the rescue of Becca, Sam and their four children who are swamped by clutter. Fortunately, interior designer Alex Dauley is on hand with some clever solutions.

programme.desc: Singapore 1 - Donal is off to Singapore, a melting pot of cultures all in one fantastically diverse city. This wealthy island nation has a reputation as a futuristic shrine to consumerism. Singaporeans live fast-paced lifestyles, so street food is very popular.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Forest Sets the Flavour - Rachel heads into the woods in search of mushrooms. She also meets an ice-cream maker who inspires her to experiment with flavours, as she makes a lemon and dill parfait.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Thompson Family - Vikkie and Wayne have a habit of cooking a nightly backup meal for their fussy kids, which has made their shopping bills and food waste skyrocket. Will their kids like what Prue and Rupy have planned?

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Osaka - Paul Hollywood's culinary journey across Japan concludes as he enters a noodle-eating challenge, dines with the largest-ever sumo and goes on an 'eat-till-you-drop' tour in Osaka.

programme.desc: The fourth quarter-final sees the contenders prepare inventive dishes based on cheese. Then they must cook for critics Tracey MacLeod, Jimi Famurewa and Jay Rayner.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep1
programme.desc: After creating a warm, spicy and aromatic dish of lamb shanks with wide noodles, Nigella turns her attention to very ripe bananas, which she uses to make a gloriously rich and gooey chocolate tahini pudding, and then goes on to create a warming curry with a surprising ingredient.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Perfectly Paired - Rachel explores new ways to pair chocolate with other flavours. She learns the science of tasting chocolate and makes dishes such as chocolate cardamom meringues.

programme.desc: It's day one for the second heat of bakers as they take on a topsy-turvy cake in their first ever Technical, and express their wildest imaginings in 'Dream Come True' cakes.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how to stretch a tub of mince by making two dishes from it: meatball kebabs and crispy pork and homemade noodles. programme.desc: A New Diverse Cuisine - Rachel visits Malmo, and the multicultural feel of the city gives her inspiration to make a Swedish green shakshuka. For dessert, Rachel prepares very tasty chocolate oat cookies.

programme.desc: Bread Week - It's bread week in the Bake Off tent and Siba and Paul task the bakers with pizza making in the signature Challenge. It all comes down to the showstopper, involving elaborate bread structures and loaves from around the world.

programme.desc: It's Bread Day for the second heat of bakers, as they tackle a cute Technical challenge with a spicy kick and a fiddly focaccia Showstopper depicting the best day of their lives.

programme.desc: Among the guests on Graham's sofa tonight: Oscar-winner Julianne Moore, starring in Todd Haynes' critically-acclaimed "May December"; and comedy superstar Ricky Gervais.

programme.desc: The bakers make a classic cottage loaf and head to Devon for the Technical. Whose plaited centrepiece will get the Breadmaster himself, Paul Hollywood, in a twist?
